::Aerotaur::
    He stiffened at the voice behind him.  But only for an instant.  He then 
shot up higher into the sky.  The blast catches his left knee blowing his 
lower leg off.  He howls in pain.  "WINDLORD!  TAKE HIM OUT!"  He flies 
higher unable to land.  Mech fluid gushes from his leg.  He opens another 
eight shot barrage at Deemos.
